text:
@realDonaldTrump Your idiotic trade war cost Americans dearly. Ivanka profited from your self dealing so that is all that matters.

We continue paying the tariffs you imposed, not China. You bankrupted farmers, and then your failed covid19 response killed 94k+ Americans and destroyed the economy.
